description: Single storey rear extension (Lawful Development Certificate)
decision_conditions: It is a requirement of Class A, condition A.4 of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 that the development shall be carried out in accordance with the information that the developer provided to the local planning authority, unless the local planning authority and the developer agree otherwise in writing.  2.	It is a requirement of Class A, condition A.4 of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 that the development shall be completed on or before 30th May 2019. 3.	It is a requirement of Class A, condition A.4 of the General Permitted Development Order 2015, that the developer shall notify the local planning authority of the completion of the development as soon as reasonably practicable after completion, and that this notification shall be in writing and shall include (a) the name of the developer, (b) the address or location of the development, and (c) the date of completion. 4.	All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.
